snippet: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said it would provide more training and urge hospitals to run drills to practice dealing with potential Ebola patients.
abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention say agency will take new steps to help hospital workers protect themselves, providing more training and urging hospitals to practice dealing with potential Ebola patients.
lead_paragraph: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said it would provide more training and urge hospitals to run drills to practice dealing with potential Ebola patients.

headline.main: C.D.C. Will Offer More Ebola Training to Health Care Workers
headline.print_headline: Agency Will Offer More Ebola Training

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
